However, I wonder how to install Adobe PDF driver.

This is the way I tried and failed in Windows 7:
1. Device and Printers > Add a printer > Add a local printer > Use an existing port > FILE: (Print to File) > Have Disk... > Browse... > \Adobe PDF Printer\Xtras\AdobePDF\AdobePDF.inf
2. Then here are 10 list of "Adobe PDF Converter". However, the names of the 10 items are the same. 
3. I chose each item and finish it. In each case, I couldn't use the print to print a txt file into PDF file. 

Is this wrong way? Please tell me how to install the driver. :D
